applicationProfileUsageNote.en: Timings (plural) instead of time (singular), i.e. it is about something (e.g. meeting, task, event) that takes place repeatedly, typically according to a regular pattern (e.g. rehearsal every Friday).

applicationProfileDefinition.en: Time when it ends.
Exceptional non-event dates.

applicationProfileUsageNote.en: E.g. 10 times from the start date.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: Days of the week when it takes place.

applicationProfileUsageNote.en: Use the URIs of schema.org, e.g. https://schema.org/Monday for Monday. These redirect to Wikidata where you can also find the Dutch translation, e.g. http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q105 for Monday.
